# Date.ISO8601FormatStyle.TimeSeparator.colon

**Case**

Specifies a colon character separating the time components in an ISO 8601 date format style.

## Declaration

```swift
case colon
```

## Discussion

The `rawValue` of `colon` is “`:”`.

## Specifying ISO 8601 Format Style Time Separators

- **Date.ISO8601FormatStyle.TimeSeparator.omitted**: Specifies no separator between the time components in an ISO 8601 date format style.
